definition: background/bottom/base/end (of the month, year etc)/remnants/(math.) radix/base

sentences.english: You just don't know but we have faith in our bosses and the people upstairs.
sentences.chinese: 你心裏沒底，但是我們對我們的老闆和管理層有信心。

sentences.english: Sorry, my heart has no bottom.
But when he opens his mouth he laughs because he is afraid.
sentences.chinese: 但他一開口卻笑了起來，他心裏還是沒底。

sentences.english: I have been unconfident in whether this matter can be accomplished.
sentences.chinese: 這件事情能不能辦成，我心裏一直沒底。

sentences.english: My heart follows the wind that blows amain.
sentences.chinese: 我的心沒底止的跟着風吹。
